revised_title: Further Observations on the Comparative Physiology of Suprarenal Capsules and Their Extracts
tldr: The author investigates the effects of extracts from suprarenal capsules on various mammals, finding that medullary material is fatal while cortical extracts have no significant physiological effects. This provides further evidence for the homology of the paired bodies of Elasmobranchs with the medulla of the mammalian suprarenal.
